    name="my_search_application",
    search_application={
        "indices": [
            "index1",
            "index2"
        ],
        "template": {
            "script": {
                "lang": "mustache",
                "source": "\n      {\n        \"query\": {\n          \"multi_match\": {\n            \"query\": \"{{query_string}}\",\n            \"fields\": [{{#text_fields}}\"{{name}}^{{boost}}\",{{/text_fields}}]\n          }\n        },\n        \"explain\": \"{{explain}}\",\n        \"from\": \"{{from}}\",\n        \"size\": \"{{size}}\"\n      }\n      ",
                "params": {
                    "query_string": "*",
                    "text_fields": [
                        {
                            "name": "title",
                            "boost": 10
                        },
                        {
                            "name": "description",
                            "boost": 5
                        }
                    ],
                    "explain": False,
                    "from": 0,
                    "size": 10
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
